name: Death Gun
description:
DEATH GUN A score based bullet hell where you need to throw your gun to regain health!

Blast Fast and throw your weapon to regain your health, simple.

Move quick with a dash move and shoot like hell! Throw your weapon to regain health. Get a thrown weapon kill while bleeding out to stay in the fight!

Check out the trailer below:

Made for Ludum Dare 43 in 48 hours.
